notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: G.L. envisioned and with O.B. proposed this study. P.S., L.S., S.G., O.B. and G.L. designed and planned the research. P.S. performed the ToF-SIMS and SEM measurements and corresponding data analyses. S.G. prepared the skin samples and performed the cutaneous absorptions study. O.B. made the formulations applied to the skin. P.S., G.L. and S.G. wrote the paper. All authors discussed and interpreted the results and contributed to drafts of the final paper.
